Header: Views expressed on formation of a new party
Content: Views were expressed on whether a group from the  SLFP would defect from the party and form a new one. State Minister of Finance, Lakshman Yapa Abeywardene stated that they have a responsiblity to unite the two important leaders and thereafter appointment he will take the party forward. UPFA Parliamentarian, Piyal Nishantha stated that  there are talks among people and other leaders on the establishment of a new party. He added that they are interested as the opposition, to strengthen SLFP and the people of the country. Former Deputy Chairman of Medawachchiya PS, Nalinda Wijeratne stated that no matter who forms a party, they will contest under the symbol of the hand or betel, to secure victory of the SLFP.
